office: President pro tempore of the United States Senate
order3: Chairman of the Senate Committee on Appropriations
order4: Chairman of the Senate Committee on Commerce, Science and Transportation
order5: Chairman of the Senate Committee on Indian Affairs
predecessor5: Mark Andrews (1987), Ben N. Campbell (2001), Ben N. Campbell (2001)
successor5: John McCain (1995), Ben N. Campbell (2001), Ben N. Campbell (2003)
order6: Chairman of the Senate Select Committee on Intelligence
order8: Member of the Hawaii Territorial Senate
order9: Member of the Hawaii Territorial House of Representatives
spouse: Margaret Shinobu Awamura  (1949–2006, her death) , Irene Hirano  (2008–present)
alma_mater: University of Hawaii, Manoa, The George Washington University
awards: Medal of Honor,  Bronze Star,  Purple Heart,  World War II Victory Medal
